message: Mack enters Guilty plea. According to court filings, Mack directly or implicitly required her slaves, including Jane Does 1 and 2, as identified in the Indictment, to engage in sexual activity

data.description: Smallville alumna Allison Mack has changed her plea to guilty in the wild sex-cult case. She originally had pleaded not guilty on racketeering charges of sex trafficking, sex trafficking conspiracy…
data.title: ‘Smallville’s Allison Mack Pleads Guilty In Sex Cult Case
